/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11     -pthread -Wl,-rpath -Wl,/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib -Wl,--enable-new-dtags -L/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib -lmpi_cxx -lmpi -lopen-rte -lopen-pal -lutil -lnsl -ldl -lmca_common_sm -lvt -Wl,--export-dynamic CMakeFiles/split_str_test.dir/split_str.cpp.o  -o split_str_test  -L/home/mzhou/mylib/openmpi/lib  -L/home/mzhou/Downloads/boost_1_60_0/stage/lib -rdynamic
